rukus.text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha nudiya lilssalati min yawmi l-jumuʿati fa-is'ʿaw ila dhik'ri l-lahi wadharu l-bayʿa dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamuna
fa-idha qudiyati l-salatu fa-intashiru fi l-ardi wa-ib'taghu min fadli l-lahi wa-udh'kuru l-laha kathiran laʿallakum tuf'lihuna
wa-idha ra-aw tijaratan aw lahwan infaddu ilayha watarakuka qaiman qul ma ʿinda l-lahi khayrun mina l-lahwi wamina l-tijarati wal-lahu khayru l-raziqina
